https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eW8p4xYCCTg8OrMqtMUvRStGzPm.jpg "Hermanos" is the story of Juan and Mateo, two childhood friends whose older brothers are leaders of rival Latino street gangs. It's about the struggle to maintain a friendship while staying loyal to family in an unforgiving neighborhood. Brothers
